tool_description: Litz is a url shortner service which enables you to create short links so you can share it. You can also get analytics like the views of the short links you created at low cost. Many more features like the country, city, time, device, browser, OS at which the link was clicked/viewed will be added.
name: URL Shortner
title: URL Shortner

api_list.name: Create a short link
api_list.description:
Use this Endpoint to create short link from a long url to share it across the internet.

Example: [https://litz.in/Iiw14AeoM](https://litz.in/Iiw14AeoM)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortner8.p.rapidapi.com/create-short-link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-shortner8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get link analytics
api_list.description: API endpoint to get analytics of a short link you have generated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-shortner8.p.rapidapi.com/get-link-analytics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

print(response.json())
